diff_hunk:
@@ -141,6 +141,10 @@ def current_student?
       student.any?
   end
 
+  def notepad
body: I'm not sure if I like adding `User#notepad` when it only applies to supervisor-users. I would love User have no knowledge of `Note` whatsoever. Could you move the `find_or_create` to the `Note` class and update the Supervisor::NotesController#update accordingly?
body_html: I'm not sure if I like adding User#notepad when it only applies to supervisor-users. I would love User have no knowledge of Note whatsoever. Could you move the find_or_create to the Note class and update the Supervisor::NotesController#update accordingly?
